DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether online tracking tool weight maintenance coach visit patient real-time electronic progress report primary care provider ( PCPs ) [ Continued Coaching ( CC ) ] support successful weight maintenance online tracking tool alone [ Tracking Only ( TO ) ] group primary care patient lose â‰¥ 5 % body weight .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator aim address key problem implement U.S.Preventive Services Task Force obesity treatment recommendation cost-effective manner . The investigator propose Randomized Clinical Trial - Maintaining Activity Nutrition Technology-Assisted Innovation Primary Care ( MAINTAIN-PC ) - test whether group primary care patient lose least 5 % body weight past year likely maintain weight loss multifaceted intervention include online tracking tool , web-based `` coaching '' visit , PCP engagement real time electronic progress report counsel tip use online tracking tool alone . By integrate intervention within exist electronic health record clinical flow , investigator maximize potential future dissemination . The MAINTAIN-PC study draw upon recommendation design practical clinical behavioral trial . The investigator assess multiple relevant outcome across clinically meaningful treatment strategy . The investigator recruit sample diverse term gender , BMI co-morbidity status , racial/ethnic mix reflective region , include Agency Healthcare Research Quality priority population . The investigator include clinical practice diverse characteristic , select interventionists reflect level training typically see among primary care clinic staff . The investigator recruit 30-40 participant month , recruitment last 5-6 month , participant CC TO arm receive 30 month intervention . The last year study focus analysis , include cost-effectiveness analysis .
DOC.criteria: 18 75 year old Intentional & verify weight loss great equal 5 % body weight past two year previous BMI great equal 25 . Patient participate PCP Has/willing get electronic personal health record account Unable perform moderate exercise accord PCP Current plan pregnancy Currently breastfeed Recent plan bariatric surgery Edema due medical condition No access computer Treated cancer thyroid disease past year Unable attend group session comply requirement Any reason determine Principal Investigator
